title: HPI 23 - Source Code - Badarayana’s Vedanta-sutra
itunes:title: HPI 23 - Source Code - Badarayana’s Vedanta-sutra
description: The founding text of the Vedānta school, the Vedānta- or Brahma-Sūtra, interprets the Upaniṣads as teaching that all things derive from brahman.
content:encoded: The founding text of the Vedānta school, the Vedānta- or Brahma-Sūtra, interprets the Upaniṣads as teaching that all things derive from brahman.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
